sentences.sContent: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.sCn: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

sentences.sContent: ...These improvements don't mean we shouldn't attempt to control our use of technology...
...By recapturing the attempt of the monarch and noting where they came from...
...I have to warn you that it would take quite a while to force management to replace the old machines and attempt to get you transferred may or may not be successful...
...it is inadvisable/unwise to attempt to conquer it...
...Bowerman was also known for experimenting with the design of running shoes in an attempt to make them lighter and more shock-absorbent...

phrases.pCn: 想做做不到的事；缘木求鱼

remMethod.val: at(表加强) ＋ tempt(诱惑， 考验) → 试图引诱别人 → 试图

trans.tranCn: 尝试， 试图， 努力
trans.tranOther: to try to do something, especially something difficult
